mapper.insert: insert into chapter_info(chapter_name, chapter_video_src, chapter_cover_src, parent, uuid) value (#{chapter_name}, #{chapter_video_src}, #{chapter_cover_src}, #{parent}, #{uuid})
mapper.update: update chapter_info set chapter_name=#{chapter_name}, chapter_video_src=#{chapter_video_src}, chapter_cover_src=#{chapter_cover_src}, parent=#{parent}, uuid=#{uuid} where id = #{id}
